messages.message: I tried navigating to a batch where I don’t have access to the app and I’m seeing this (instead of an error screen). Additionally , in this case, the “Back” button doesn’t do anything. cc @Udit @andy

@Travis do you want to look into this since its app related?

@Arjun does this happen when you enter the url directly or how does user end up here if not?

yup, I directly accessed the batch via url. If I try to just access the app url I get a blocking modal that says I don’t have access and there’s a button to go back to home page — we might want to do something similar. In Build I know if the user doesn’t have access to the project we just show an error screen though
